items.title: Exercise 1: Press Release Analysis
items.text:
PRESS RELEASE
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE

EcoTech Solutions Announces Strategic Partnership with GreenWay Energy

LONDON, UK — EcoTech Solutions, a leader in sustainable office technology, is proud to announce a new partnership with GreenWay Energy. This collaboration is expected to accelerate the development of carbon-neutral workspaces across Europe.

It is widely believed that this partnership will set a new standard for corporate sustainability. 'What we have achieved today is more than just a contract,' said James Miller, CEO of EcoTech. 'It is a commitment to the future.'

For media enquiries, please contact the Administration Office at media@ecotech.co.uk.

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of this press release?
questions.explanation: The headline and first paragraph state that the release is announcing a new partnership.

questions.question: Which phrase indicates a reporting passive structure?
questions.explanation: 'It is widely believed that' is a classic reporting passive structure.

items.prompt: Exercise 2: PR Vocabulary. To 'liaise with the press' means:
options: To work together and share information with the media
To sue a newspaper for libel
To write a private diary entry
items.explanation: Liaising involves establishing a working relationship to cooperate on information sharing.

items.prompt: Exercise 3: Reporting Passives. Rewrite this active sentence as a reporting passive: 'People estimate that the project will cost £2 million.'
items.modelAnswer: It is estimated that the project will cost £2 million.

items.prompt: Exercise 4: Personal Passives. Rewrite this sentence: 'Everyone says that the CEO is very intelligent.'
items.modelAnswer: The CEO is said to be very intelligent.

items.prompt: Exercise 5: Media Chunks. Complete the sentence: 'We need to ____ a press release before the news leaks.'
items.explanation: The standard professional chunk is 'to issue a press release'.
